00034 /******************************************************************************
00035                    Defines section
00036 ******************************************************************************/
00037 #if defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00038 #define CTRLA(pwmUnit)        MMIO_REG(pwmUnit, uint32_t)
00039 #define CTRLBCLR(pwmUnit)     MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 4U, uint8_t)
00040 #define CTRLBSET(pwmUnit)     MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 5U, uint8_t)
00041 #define SYNCBUSY(pwmUnit)     MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 8U, uint32_t)
00042 #define DRVCTRL(pwmUnit)      MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x18U, uint32_t)
00043 #define INTENCLR(pwmUnit)     MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x24U, uint32_t)
00044 #define INTENSET(pwmUnit)     MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x28U, uint32_t)
00045 #define INTFLAG(pwmUnit)      MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x2cU, uint32_t)
00046 #define COUNT(pwmUnit)        MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x34U, uint32_t)
00047 #define PATT(pwmUnit)         MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x38U, uint16_t)
00048 #define WAVE(pwmUnit)         MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x3CU, uint32_t)
00049 #define PER(pwmUnit)          MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x40U, uint32_t)
00050 #define CC0(pwmUnit)          MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x44U, uint32_t)
00051 #define CC1(pwmUnit)          MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x48U, uint32_t)
00052 #define CC2(pwmUnit)          MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x4CU, uint32_t)
00053 #define CC3(pwmUnit)          MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x50U, uint32_t)
00054 #define CCx(pwmUnit,channel)  MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x44U + channel*4, uint32_t)
00055 #define FCTRLA(pwmUnit)       MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x0CU, uint32_t)
00056 #define FCTRLB(pwmUnit)       MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x10U, uint32_t)
00057 #define WEXCTRL(pwmUnit)      MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x14U, uint32_t)
00058 #define DBGCTRL(pwmUnit)      MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x1EU, uint8_t)
00059 #define EVCTRL(pwmUnit)       MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x20U, uint32_t)
00060 #define STATUS(pwmUnit)       MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x30U, uint32_t)
00061 #define PATTB(pwmUnit)        MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x64U, uint16_t)
00062 #define WAVEB(pwmUnit)        MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x68U, uint32_t)
00063 #define PERB(pwmUnit)         MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x6cU, uint32_t)
00064 #define CCB0(pwmUnit)         MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x70U, uint32_t)
00065 #define CCB1(pwmUnit)         MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x74U, uint32_t)
00066 #define CCB2(pwmUnit)         MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x78U, uint32_t)
00067 #define CCB3(pwmUnit)         MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x7cU, uint32_t)
00068 #define CCBx(pwmUnit,channel) MMIO_REG(pwmUnit + 0x70U + channel*4, uint32_t)
00069 
00070 #define CHANNELS_PER_UNIT 8
00071 
00072 #else
00073 #define TCCRnA(pwmUnit) MMIO_BYTE(pwmUnit)
00074 #define TCCRnB(pwmUnit) MMIO_BYTE(pwmUnit + 1U)
00075 #define TCCRnC(pwmUnit) MMIO_BYTE(pwmUnit + 2U)
00076 #define TCNTn(pwmUnit)  MMIO_WORD(pwmUnit + 4U)
00077 #define ICRn(pwmUnit)   MMIO_WORD(pwmUnit + 6U)
00078 #define OCRnA(pwmUnit)  MMIO_WORD(pwmUnit + 8U)
00079 #define OCRnB(pwmUnit)  MMIO_WORD(pwmUnit + 10U)
00080 #define OCRnC(pwmUnit)  MMIO_WORD(pwmUnit + 12U)
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 #define PWM_SUCCESS_STATUS            0
00084 #define PWM_INVALID_UNIT_STATUS      -1
00085 #define PWM_INVALID_CHANNEL_STATUS   -2
00086 #define PWM_INVALID_PRESCALER_STATUS -3
00087 
00088 /******************************************************************************
00089                    Types section
00090 ******************************************************************************/
00091 #if defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00092 
00093 typedef  volatile int32_t * ddrPtr;
00094 typedef  volatile uint32_t * ocrPtr;
00095 typedef  volatile uint32_t   pinPos;
00096 
00097 #else
00098 typedef  volatile uint8_t  * ddrPtr;
00099 typedef  volatile uint16_t * ocrPtr;
00100 typedef  volatile uint8_t    pinPos;
00101 
00102 #endif
00103 /**************************************************************************/
00106 #if defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00107 typedef enum
00108 {
00109   PWM_STOPPED,
00110   PWM_PRESCALER_1=1,
00111   PWM_PRESCALER_2=2,
00112   PWM_PRESCALER_4=4,
00113   PWM_PRESCALER_8=8,
00114   PWM_PRESCALER_16=16,
00115   PWM_PRESCALER_64=64,
00116   PWM_PRESCALER_256=256,
00117   PWM_PRESCALER_1024=1024,
00118   PWM_PRESCALER_INVALID
00119 } HAL_PwmPrescaler_t;
00120 #else
00121 typedef enum
00122 {
00123   PWM_STOPPED,
00124   PWM_PRESCALER_1=1,
00125   PWM_PRESCALER_8=8,
00126   PWM_PRESCALER_64=64,
00127   PWM_PRESCALER_256=256,
00128   PWM_PRESCALER_1024=1024,
00129   PWM_PRESCALER_EXT_CLOCK_ON_FALLING_EDGE,
00130   PWM_PRESCALER_EXT_CLOCK_ON_RISING_EDGE,
00131   PWM_PRESCALER_INVALID
00132 } HAL_PwmPrescaler_t;
00133 #endif
00134 
00135 /**************************************************************************/
00138 #if defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00139 typedef enum
00140 {
00141   PWM_CHANNEL_0,
00142   PWM_CHANNEL_1,
00143   PWM_CHANNEL_2,
00144   PWM_CHANNEL_3,
00145   PWM_CHANNEL_4,
00146   PWM_CHANNEL_5,
00147   PWM_CHANNEL_6,
00148   PWM_CHANNEL_7,
00149   PWM_INVALID_CHANNEL
00150 } HAL_PwmChannel_t;
00151 #else
00152 typedef enum
00153 {
00154   PWM_CHANNEL_0,
00155   PWM_CHANNEL_1,
00156 #ifndef ATMEGA1284
00157   PWM_CHANNEL_2,
00158 #endif /* ATMEGA1284 */
00159   PWM_INVALID_CHANNEL
00160 } HAL_PwmChannel_t;
00161 #endif
00162 
00163 /**************************************************************************/
00166 typedef enum
00167 {
00169   PWM_POLARITY_NON_INVERTED,
00171   PWM_POLARITY_INVERTED
00172 } HAL_PwmPolarity_t;
00173 
00174 /**************************************************************************/
00177 #if defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00178 typedef enum
00179 {
00180   /* Base address of TCC0 register */
00181   PWM_UNIT_0 = 0x42002000,
00182   /* Base address of TCC1 register */
00183   PWM_UNIT_1 = 0x42002400,
00184   /* Base address of TCC2 register */
00185   PWM_UNIT_2 = 0x42002800,
00186   PWM_INVALID_UNIT
00187 } HAL_PwmUnit_t;
00188 
00189 typedef enum
00190 {
00191   /* No dithering */
00192   NO_DITH,
00193   /* dithering every 16 PWM frames */
00194   DITH4,
00195   /* dithering every 32 PWM frames */
00196   DITH5,
00197   /* dithering every 64 PWM frames */
00198   DITH6
00199 } HAL_PwmDithering_t;
00200 
00201 #else
00202 typedef enum
00203 {
00204   /* Base address of T/C1 PWM related registers */
00205   PWM_UNIT_1 = 0x80,
00206   /* Base address of T/C3 PWM related registers */
00207   PWM_UNIT_3 = 0x90
00208 } HAL_PwmUnit_t;
00209 #endif
00210 
00211 /**************************************************************************/
00214 typedef struct _HAL_PwmDescriptor_t
00215 {
00216   /* Service fields for internal use. */
00217   struct
00218   {
00219     /* Pointer to Data Direction Register. PWM port dependent. */
00220     ddrPtr DDRn;
00221     /* PWN channel pin number. PWM port dependent. */
00222     pinPos pwmBaseChannelPin;
00223     /* Compare Output Mode low bit position. PWM channel dependent. */
00224     uint8_t COMnx0;
00225     /* Output Compare Register. PWM channel dependent. */
00226     ocrPtr OCRnx;
00227   } service;
00228   /* PWM unit number. Equal to ID of Timer/Counter witch serves PWM module. */
00229   HAL_PwmUnit_t unit;
00230 #if defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00231   /* channel pin cfg */
00232   PinConfig_t channelPinCfg[CHANNELS_PER_UNIT];
00233   /* channel mask for channels 0-7 */
00234   uint8_t channelMask;
00235   /* polarity mask for channels 0-7 */
00236   uint8_t polarityMask;
00237   /* dithering mask for channels 0-7 */
00238   uint8_t ditheringMask;
00239   /* Enhanced Dithering resoultion */
00240   HAL_PwmDithering_t dithResoultion;
00241   /* Extra cycles to add into the frame if Dithering is enabled*/
00242   uint8_t dithercycles;
00243 #else
00244   /* PWM channel */
00245   HAL_PwmChannel_t channel;
00246   /* PWM polarity */
00247   HAL_PwmPolarity_t polarity;
00248 #endif
00249 } HAL_PwmDescriptor_t;
